people_also_ask.question: Is a vegetable chopper worth it?
people_also_ask.heading: The point of a vegetable chopper is to save you time and hassle during meal preparation. But if it takes a ton of time and effort to clean the tool after dinner, then it really isn't worth the purchase. The easiest choppers to clean can be taken apart and tossed in the dishwasher with little fuss.22-Mar-2021
